titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works of the Senate.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works of the Senate.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Boxer. Without written report.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works from March 1, 2013, through September 30, 2013.
